p: Stability values of the reference genes pabpc1a, rpl35 and rpsa were high (less than 0.06 for all tissues and temperatures tested and, on average, less than 0.045) ( S2 Fig, supporting information), with little variation (stability values of rpsa varied between 0.029 and 0.041, for rpl35 between 0.017 and 0.051, and for pabpc1a between 0.030 and 0.059). These stability values are inferior to those observed by [ 49], which makes them suitable for gene expression normalization of our target genes.
